participant_1.background:
I enjoy being active, and my family is always up for an adventure.
I live alone and cook for myself.
i love family time.
my favorite musician is ed sheeran.
i live on a ranch.

participant_2.background:
I have started baking for my family and friends.
I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit.
My smartphone is my most valued material possession because it is an essential tool for my life
I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving.
I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing great! I'm just relaxing at home after a long day of work.
That sounds nice. I just got home from work myself. I'm a welder.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in welding, but I've never actually tried it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely give it a try sometime.
I might just have to do that. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, go to concerts, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like fun things to do. I like to listen to music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
Oh, I like country music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but some of my favorites are Eric Church, Luke Combs, and Miranda Lambert.
Those are all great artists! I love their music too.
It's nice to meet someone who likes country music.
Me too! It's not very popular in my area, so I don't get to talk about it much.
Well, now you have someone to talk about it with!
That's true! I'm glad we met.
